text: T his is my first smartwatch. It Does everything I need plus. E z to set up and install. Very happy with this product. Came as described, unused open box. Thx
Exactly as described, maybe better. They said "Used, B+" but it looks brand new, and works perfectly. They didn't disclose that the charging cable was 3rd party, not original, but it works fine.
Arrived in excellent condition!  Very good quality product.  Would buy from this seller again.  A+ seller
This google pixel watch works flawlessly. Seller is very quick to respond in very understanding.
Item was just as described! Shipped and delivered in 7 days. The item was packaged and delivered with care. Great seller!

I had a fantastic experience purchasing from this seller. The item was exactly as described, arrived quickly, and was well-packaged. The seller communicated clearly and made sure I was fully satisfied with my purchase. I highly recommend this seller to anyone looking for a smooth and trustworthy eBay transaction. Thank you for a wonderful experience!

This gun lighter looked nothing like it did in the picture. It turned out to be cheaply made out of resin and the edges had like uncut plastic/resin on them. Just a sloppy look all together. The seller still gets a perfect rating because:
#1-They answered my e-mail promptly
#2-They addressed my complaint thoroughly
#3-They made it easy to get a refund without having to contact them multiple times

Awesome seller! I know every transaction cannot work out, but sellers like this are awesome!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Absolutely incredible phone & seller! 
I actually bought this phone for my friend… and now I’m jealous because it’s that good. The size, weight, and overall quality are perfect. This phone feels brand new. The price was amazing. I was blown away by how quickly it arrived and how carefully/smart it was packed. The shipping was supreme, and the appearance of the condition of the phone, better than described. Seriously one of the best eBay experiences I’ve had in a long time. Thank you!

Items arrived in great condition just as pictured and very well packaged and protected for shipping. A couple of items arrived with defects . Seller was quick to replace defective items.  Great seller, great products

Fantastic seller, fast shipping, Great communication and customer service, had an issue with the item and they went out of their way to fix the issue, will definently be a returning customer, highly recommend, A++++++

Got sent the wrong phone but contacted the seller and they were very helpful with responding back and replaced. Highly recommend this seller, phone came in great condition and looks great. Seller 7 out of 5 stars for going above and beyond for buyer
Item described as "Used" arrived in almost mint condition, performs great and it's better than I expected. Amazing price for this phone. Seller was helpful and responded to all my messages. Thanks!
